summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Traffic Code; revising certain permit fees levied thereunder, including fees for resident identification permits, service parking permits, commercial load zone permits, and revising the overlegal trucking/parking permit fee schedule; providing regulations for commercial load zones; amending Seattle Municipal Code (SMC) Sections 11.14.115, 11.16.280, 11.16.319, 11.26.260, 11.72.020 and adding new sections to SMC Chapters 11.14, 11.23, 11.28, and 11.72.
